attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This devisive allowance to post 16 year old students is being abused by many families.

For example a number of students at my local college have spent the last 7 years in private education paid for by ther parents at a cost of £6,000 per year. 

The parents are self employed so by the wonder of some accounting system they can then claim EMA at £30 per week.

This is wrong and the system is unfair to those students who want to study without any 'bribe' to attend college.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NO-ema/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
